title: Mord VU?
body:
Anyone think we'll see a {{champion:82}} VU?
I'm wondering now that he got the Juggernaut update if hope for a VU is all but lost! 
Do the giant feet in paticular bug anyone else?

replies.body:
Morde is expected to get a bit better of a rework. The only they recently gave him was a trial run and they've admitted to their mistakes. 

I dunno when he'll get his chance, but he'll get it eventually. Poppy is next on the list for Sion-level updates and Shen and Taric have smaller reworks and likely VU's with it soonish, so we'll see. Currently, while the feet are still a bother, the retexture really helped... a lot.

Your not the first i've heard this from yet its only after making this (and one other post) that i've heard! I'd love more detail if you remember where you heard it! :)

I've heard Shen's will be smallish, and Yorick is supposed to be up in there at some point along with Urgot. Also I'm still hoping for an Evelynn update! So much to hope for, so little patience.... XP

I can't remember where I saw it. It was simply a mentioning from one of the Rioters saying if this current Morde doesn't work as intended, which it isn't, they were going to have to full scale rework him. I'll try to find the post, but it may take a while.
No worries, but on the other hand, the new Mord might be working exactly as they intended, and their certainly scaling him to fit it better

Yes, most of us can say that Riot should give him a VU, but when the juggernaut update came along, they said that he wasn't top priority, so yeah, no idea on when he going to get one. I am hoping that once riot gets the Poppy, Taric, Shen updates out of the way, they could shed some light on Mordekaiser and Eve, who, in my point of view, is in the same boat as Mordekaiser.

I can definitely agree with the Eve part! 
I guess to me the Mord update should be simpler, and sooner just because he only needs a VU where as the others are all getting reworks. (though I hear Shen's is relatively small, like one ability?)
Any idea on what the schedule is for updates? Last I heard Poppy was supposed to be by the end of the year, but thats all I recall.

Yes, Poppy's should be before the end of the year, so in the next 2-3 patches she will hit live, most likely. Shen and Taric will still come out during the offseason, hopefully, so after that settles down, then we will talk shop and bang on riots door until they hear us.

True, I'd like to think Eve would get an update soon just because Riot has found her near impossible to even out, she's always either to strong or to weak for them from what i've heard. Their only issue with her is that they don't really know what to do with her. 

And.... If were lucky.... one day... they will remember Yorick Morey {{champion:83}} ....
